<div class="csl-entry">BARTLETT, O. and GARDE, A., “EU public health law and policy - on the rocks? A few sobering thoughts on the growing EU alcohol problem” in HERVEY, T., YOUNG, C. and BISHOP, L. <div class="csl-entry">CALLENS, S. and GOOSSENS, M., “Experimenten op mensen. Overzicht van en reflecties bij de wet van 7 mei 2004,” <i>NJW</i>, 2004, afl. 88, 1190–1201.</div>
